code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import CardFilter from'../cardcomponent/CardFilter';import RecentActivityItem from'./RecentActivityItem';import'./recentActivity.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Recentactivity(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[filter,setFilter]=useState('Today');const handleFilterChange=filter=>{setFilter(filter);};const fatchData=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:4000/topselling').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setItems(data);}).catch(e=>console.log(e.message));};useEffect(()=>{fatchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardFilter,{filterChange:handleFilterChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:["Recent Activity ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:filter})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity",children:items&&items.length>0&&items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecentActivityItem,{item:item},item._id))})]})]});}export default Recentactivity;
